languages.text: "Сколько бы вы ни работали, они выжмут из вас все и не дадут ничего! Кто допустил подобное? Вольный торговец, да будет проклято {rt_mf|его|ее} имя! {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}Грокс{/g} на троне! Тиран{rt_mf||ша}, бросающ{rt_mf|ий|ая} наши кости в топку протектората!.."

traits.locale_text: "Сколько бы вы ни работали, как бы ни старались — они выжмут из вас все и не дадут ничего! Чья это вина? Кто допустил подобное? Вольный торговец, да будет проклято {mf|его|ее} имя! Грокс на троне! Тиран{mf||ша}, бросающ{mf|ий|ая} наши кости в топку протектората! Мы не станем слушать {mf|того|ту}, что не слушает на..."

languages.text: "No matter how hard you work, they will wring everything out of you and give you nothing! Who allowed this to happen? The Rogue Trader, {rt_mf|his|her} name be damned! A {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} on the throne! A tyrant throwing our bones into the furnace of {rt_mf|his|her} 'protectorate'—"
languages.original_text: "Сколько бы вы ни работали, они выжмут из вас все и не дадут ничего! Кто допустил подобное? Вольный торговец, да будет проклято {rt_mf|его|ее} имя! {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}Грокс{/g} на троне! Тиран{rt_mf||ша}, бросающ{rt_mf|ий|ая} наши кости в топку протектората!.."

traits.locale_text: "No matter how hard you work, they will wring everything out of you and give you nothing! Who allowed this to happen? The Rogue Trader, {mf|his|her} name be damned! Grox on the throne! A tyrant throwing our bones into the furnace of the Protectorate!"

"No matter how hard you work, they will wring everything out of you and give you nothing! Who allowed this to happen? The Rogue Trader, {mf|his|her} name be damned! Grox on the throne! A tyrant throwing our bones into the furnace of the Protectorate!"

"No matter how hard you work, they will wring everything out of you and give you nothing! Who allowed this to happen? The Rogue Trader, {mf|his|her} name be damned! Grox on the throne! A tyrant throwing our bones into the furnace of the Protectorate!"

"No matter how hard you work, they will wring everything out of you and give you nothing! Who allowed this to happen? The Rogue Trader, {mf|his|her} name be damned! Grox on the throne! A tyrant throwing our bones into the furnace of the Protectorate!"

"No matter how hard you work, they will wring everything out of you and give you nothing! Who allowed this to happen? The Rogue Trader, {rt_mf|his|her} name be damned! A {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} on the throne! A tyrant throwing our bones into the furnace of {rt_mf|his|her} 'protectorate'—"

"No matter how hard you work, they will wring everything out of you and give you nothing! Who allowed this to happen? The Rogue Trader, {rt_mf|his|her} name be damned! A {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} on the throne! A tyrant throwing our bones into the furnace of {rt_mf|his|her} 'protectorate'—"

languages.text: "So sehr Ihr Euch auch anstrengt, sie werden alles aus Euch herausquetschen und Euch nichts geben! Wer hat das zugelassen? Es war {rt_mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}, {rt_mf|sein|ihr} Name sei verdammt! Ein {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}Grox{/g} auf dem Thron! {rt_mf|Ein Tyrann, der unsere Knochen in den Ofen seines|Eine Tyrannin, die unsere Knochen in die Ofen ihres} 'Protektorats' wirft -"
languages.original_text: "No matter how hard you work, they will wring everything out of you and give you nothing! Who allowed this to happen? The Rogue Trader, {rt_mf|his|her} name be damned! A {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} on the throne! A tyrant throwing our bones into the furnace of {rt_mf|his|her} 'protectorate'—"

traits.locale_text: "So sehr Ihr Euch auch anstrengt, sie werden alles aus Euch herausquetschen und Euch nichts geben! Wer hat das zugelassen? Es war {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}, {mf|sein|ihr} Name sei verdammt! Ein Grox auf dem Thron! {mf|Ein Tyrann, der unsere Knochen in den Ofen seines|Eine Tyrannin, die unsere Knochen in die Ofen ihres} 'Protektorats' wirft -"

languages.text: «¡Por más que os esforcéis, os quitarán todo lo que tenéis y no os darán nada a cambio! ¿Quién permite esta situación? ¡{rt_mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente, maldito sea su nombre! ¡Un{rt_mf||a} {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} sentad{rt_mf|o|a} en el trono! ¡Un{rt_mf||a} tiran{rt_mf|o|a} que lanza nuestros huesos al horno de su supuesto protectorado...!».
languages.original_text: "No matter how hard you work, they will wring everything out of you and give you nothing! Who allowed this to happen? The Rogue Trader, {rt_mf|his|her} name be damned! A {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} on the throne! A tyrant throwing our bones into the furnace of {rt_mf|his|her} 'protectorate'—"

traits.locale_text: «¡Por más que os esforcéis, os quitarán todo lo que tenéis y no os darán nada a cambio! ¿Quién permite esta situación? ¡{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente, maldito sea su nombre! ¡Un{mf||a} grox sentad{mf|o|a} en el trono! ¡Un{mf||a} tiran{mf|o|a} que lanza nuestros huesos al horno de su supuesto protectorado...!».

languages.text: 「どんなに働いたところで、連中はお前たちからすべてを搾り取り、何も与えやしない！こんなことを許したのは誰だ？ローグトレーダーだ、その名を呪ってやる！王座に就いた{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}蜥蜴牛{/g}！俺らの骨を『保護領』の炉に投げ込む暴君…」
languages.original_text: "No matter how hard you work, they will wring everything out of you and give you nothing! Who allowed this to happen? The Rogue Trader, {rt_mf|his|her} name be damned! A {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} on the throne! A tyrant throwing our bones into the furnace of {rt_mf|his|her} 'protectorate'—"

traits.locale_text: 「どんなに働いたところで、連中はお前たちからすべてを搾り取り、何も与えやしない！こんなことを許したのは誰だ？ローグトレーダーだ、その名を呪ってやる！王座に就いた蜥蜴牛！俺らの骨を『保護領』の炉に投げ込む暴君…」

languages.text: “哪怕你们再怎么努力，他们也只会把你们全都榨干！什么都不会给你们！是谁允许了这样的暴行？是行商浪人！是那坨坐在王位上的臭屎！愿神皇诅咒{rt_mf|他|她}的名字！那个暴君把我们的尸体丢进了{rt_mf|他|她}的熔炉里，还说什么这是{rt_mf|他|她}的王朝——”{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}{/g}
languages.original_text: "No matter how hard you work, they will wring everything out of you and give you nothing! Who allowed this to happen? The Rogue Trader, {rt_mf|his|her} name be damned! A {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} on the throne! A tyrant throwing our bones into the furnace of {rt_mf|his|her} 'protectorate'—"

traits.locale_text: “哪怕你们再怎么努力，他们也只会把你们全都榨干！什么都不会给你们！是谁允许了这样的暴行？是行商浪人！是那坨坐在王位上的臭屎！愿神皇诅咒{mf|他|她}的名字！那个暴君把我们的尸体丢进了{mf|他|她}的熔炉里，还说什么这是{mf|他|她}的王朝——”
“哪怕你们再怎么努力，他们也只会把你们全都榨干！什么都不会给你们！是谁允许了这样的暴行？是行商浪人！是那坨坐在王位上的臭屎！愿神皇诅咒{rt_mf|他|她}的名字！那个暴君把我们的尸体丢进了{rt_mf|他|她}的熔炉里，还说什么这是{rt_mf|他|她}的王朝——”

languages.text: « Ils s'en fichent que vous travailliez dur ! Ils tireront tout ce qu'ils peuvent de vous sans rien vous donner en retour ! Qui a permis ça ? {rt_mf|Maudit|Maudite} soit {rt_mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} ! Il a fallu qu'on se retrouve avec un {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} sur le trône ! Un tyran qui jette nos os dans la fournaise de son protectorat... »
languages.original_text: "No matter how hard you work, they will wring everything out of you and give you nothing! Who allowed this to happen? The Rogue Trader, {rt_mf|his|her} name be damned! A {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} on the throne! A tyrant throwing our bones into the furnace of {rt_mf|his|her} 'protectorate'—"

traits.locale_text: « Ils s'en fichent que vous travailliez dur ! Ils tireront tout ce qu'ils peuvent de vous sans rien vous donner en retour ! Qui a permis ça ? {mf|Maudit|Maudite} soit {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} ! Il a fallu qu'on se retrouve avec un grox sur le trône ! Un tyran qui jette nos os dans la fournaise de son protectorat... »

languages.text: "Ne kadar sıkı çalışırsanız çalışın size baskıyla her şeyi yaptırıp karşılığında hiçbir şey vermeyecekler! Bunun olmasına müsaade eden kim? Adı batasıca Hür Tacir! Tahta oturmuş bir {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}groks{/g}! Protektorasının fırınına kemiklerimizi fırlatan bir tiran..."
languages.original_text: "No matter how hard you work, they will wring everything out of you and give you nothing! Who allowed this to happen? The Rogue Trader, {rt_mf|his|her} name be damned! A {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} on the throne! A tyrant throwing our bones into the furnace of {rt_mf|his|her} 'protectorate'—"
